title: Harley-Davidson banks on Hero MotoCorp partnership to push premium bike sales in India
description: Harley-Davidson plans to sell locally-produced premium bikes in India in partnership with Hero MotoCorp. The move comes as India imposes a 50% customs duty on imported fully built up bikes, hindering sales of Harley-Davidson's imported bikes. Harley-Davidson had announced to discontinue sales and manufacturing operations in India in September 2020.
